channel.title: [317] dimension-x | first release | looking for staff [317]
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://www.dimensionrsps.com/"][IMG]http://imgur.com/IWZLZh7.png[/img][/URL] [B][SIZE=3][COLOR="#00FFFF"]Please refrain from leaving flame comments about how crap the server is. This is one of my first projects like this and if you have a problem i'd prefer you to notify me and if you can advise me on how to fix it.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[video=youtube;ij3495A1fgc]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ij3495A1fgc[/video]
[B][U][SIZE=5]Server Features:[/SIZE][/U][/B] [SIZE=3][COLOR="#FFA500"] [ul][*]Automatic Voting System! [*]Automatic Donation System! [*]%99 Uptime [*]Barrows minigame with Barrows points [*]Barbarian Assault minigame with neat rewards [*]Dicing has been added, just use ::dice in a CC and gamble with your friends! [*]Forums are sexy asf [*]Tokhaar-kal added [*]Ragefire/Steadfast/Glaiven has been added! [*]Torva/Virtus added (Pernix isn't yet) [*]Donator Zone with Donator Point store [*]VPS Hosted [*]Our website isn't complete yet but it's looking sexy alongside the forums. ( [url=http://dimensionrsps.com/]Dimension-X | Contact Us[/url] ) [*]All chaotics added and work %100. [*]Skilling works but some skills need fixing. With a skilling area and shop. [*]Sexy Donor, PvP and Slayer Store. [*]Godwars is %100 [*]%100 uptime [*]Friendly staff and community.[/ul] [/COLOR][/SIZE]
[URL=http://"http://www.dimensionrsps.com/DXClient.zip"][SIZE=6][COLOR="#EE82EE"]CLICK HERE TO PLAY NOW[/COLOR][/SIZE][/URL] [I][U][SIZE=4]Media:[/SIZE][/U][/I]

item.title: [317] dimension-x | first release | looking for staff [317]
item.dc:creator: @hodford hodford
item.description:
@hodford wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:2, topic:555432”]Looks decent, fix your links though.
I’m also curious what this critical melee means that randomly gets shouted even when i hit 1

Current bugs.

  • Depositing items from starter pack to bank disconnect you
  • Levelled Runecrafting after completing a Hellhound task[/quote]

Runecrafting and Farming aren’t levelable yet so when you finish a slayer task you have chance of receiving XP for either, and the issues with starter I will have to look into it.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] dimension-x | first release | looking for staff [317]
